ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lament rocks, lulaby sucks
ygData.msgSnippet: i can t believe i put this song away for so long, other than the fact that i just wasn t needed for pulling.  but even now at 56 in sebilis i always have it
ygData.messageBody:
i can't believe i put this song away for so long, other than the fact that i
just wasn't needed for pulling. but even now at 56 in sebilis i always have
it memmed and am often pulling. now i am almost always with a 59 warrior
though, so he can pull singles in a lot of spots without any help just due
to his level. but it really is an icredible song for pulling at any level.

also wanted to let you know that if you are in range to sing the song, but
not in range of getting a message, as long as you do not see a resist
message than the song has stuck successfully. you may be too far away to
get the success message, but no matter how far you are if it is resisted it
will let you know.

Shada Powa, L56 Wood Elf Troubador
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr


> If I sing to a
> MOB and don't get any response, I find If I move in a bit
> closer, retarget
> and sing again I'll get a response.
